#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main()
    {
        string str;
        char s;

        getline(cin,str);
        cin >> s;
        int a;
        a = str.length();
        int counts = 0;
        for(int x = 0; x < a; x++)
        {
            if(str[x] == s)
                counts++;
        }
        cout << counts << endl;
    return 0;
    }
